title: 1997 Brabantse Pijl
data: The 1997 Brabantse Pijl was the 37th edition of the Brabantse Pijl cycle race and was held on 30 March 1997. The race started and finished in Alsemberg.[2] The race was won by Gianluca Pianegonda.[3] This cycling race article related to Belgian cycling is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it.
